verbose_text: The dysregulated genes unique to Stat1 -/- NK cells could be due to downstream influences of other cytokine signaling pathways that have been proposed to induce phosphorylation of STAT1 (e.g., IFN-gamma or IL-21); however, the transcriptional changes unique to Ifnar1 -/- NK cells suggest that non canonical type I IFN signaling pathways may be active in NK cells during viral infection.
